name: MinifyJS
description: Finds all files matching pattern **\*.maxi.js and minifies them to corresponding **\*.js
author: Innofactor Sweden
helpMarkDown: Finds all files matching pattern {**\*.maxi.js} and minifies them to corresponding {**\*.js}

inputs.name: scriptFolder
inputs.label: Script folder
inputs.helpMarkDown: Folder where script files are located.
